xt:extension.xt:name: Maven Project Support

head.title: Maven project support for Oxygen Developer

body.h2: Maven project support for Oxygen Developer
body.p: This plugin allows to support Maven projects, with a package view of directories. It adds a Maven Project view, that allows project navigation, files openning, where directory structures are displayed as packages.
It add support for dependency:/ protocol, presented at XML Prague 2018. It adds a context-menu in @href attributes, to find dependency resources in all declared Maven dependencies.
